questions.question: Let $$A$$ and $$B$$ be finite sets. If $$|A| = 15$$, $$|B| = 20$$, and $$|A \cup B| = 30$$, find the cardinality of the symmetric difference $$|A \Delta B|$$.
Let $$L = \{\alpha^n \beta^n : n \ge 1\}$$ be a language. If $$P = \alpha\alpha\beta\beta$$ and $$Q = \alpha\beta\alpha\beta$$, which of the following is true?
How many distinct ways can the letters of the word 'SUCCESS' be arranged?
In a class of $$50$$ students, $$25$$ passed Math, $$30$$ passed Physics, and $$15$$ passed both. How many students failed both subjects?
The number of injective (one-to-one) functions from a set $$A$$ with $$|A|=3$$ to a set $$B$$ with $$|B|=5$$ is:

If $$x$$ is a real number, which of the following is always true? (The notations $$\lceil x \rceil$$ and $$\lfloor x \rfloor$$ represent the ceiling function and the greatest integer function respectively.)
The number of ways to distribute $$10$$ identical candies to $$3$$ distinct children such that each child gets at least one candy is:
Consider the recurrence relation $$a_n = 2a_{n-1} + 3a_{n-2}$$ with initial conditions $$a_0 = 1$$ and $$a_1 = 2$$. What is the value of $$a_3$$?
In a group of $$N$$ people, what is the smallest $$N$$ that guarantees at least two people share the same birth month?
Which property does the relation $$R = \{(a,b) \in \mathbb{Z}^2 : |a-b| \le 1\}$$ lack to be an equivalence relation?
The negation of the statement 'All dogs are friendly and some cats are not clean' is:
options: Some dogs are not friendly or all cats are clean
Some dogs are not friendly and all cats are clean
All dogs are not friendly or some cats are clean
Some dogs are not friendly and some cats are clean

questions.question: Let $$A$$ and $$B$$ be sets. The set expression $$A \cap (B^c \cup A^c)^c$$ simplifies to:
How many 4-digit numbers can be formed using the digits $$\left\{1, 2, 3, 4, 5\right\}$$ if repetition is allowed?
In a group of $$100$$ students, $$80$$ take Math, and $$70$$ take Science. What is the maximum number of students who could be taking neither subject?
The sum of the degrees of all vertices in any graph $$G$$ is always:
options: Equal to the number of edges
Equal to the number of vertices

questions.question: The last digit of $$7^{2023}$$ is:
If $$A$$ is a finite set, and $$P(A)$$ is its power set, then $$|P(P(A))| = 256$$. What is $$|A|$$?
How many ways can you choose a committee of 3 men and 2 women from a group of 7 men and 5 women?
Which of the following logical expressions is a tautology?
The solution to the recurrence relation $$a_n = 5a_{n-1}$$ with initial condition $$a_0 = 2$$ is:
The number of permutations of the set $$\left\{1, 2, 3, 4, 5\right\}$$ that begin with $$2$$ is:
For any three sets $$A, B, C$$, the expression $$(A-B) \cup (B-A)$$ is equal to:
A multiple-choice quiz has $$10$$ questions, each with $$4$$ options. How many ways can a student answer the quiz?
The contrapositive of the statement 'If it is raining, then the ground is wet' is:
options: If the ground is wet, then it is raining
If it is not raining, then the ground is not wet
If the ground is not wet, then it is not raining
It is raining and the ground is not wet

questions.question: For a relation $$R$$ on a set $$A$$, the reflexive closure of $$R$$ is $$R \cup \Delta$$. Here, $$\Delta$$ is:
How many distinct integers must you choose to guarantee that at least two of them have the same remainder when divided by $$7$$?
The number of positive divisors of $$300$$ is:
The expression $$x + x'y$$ in Boolean algebra simplifies to:
Let $$A = \left\{1, \{1, 2\}\right\}$$. Which of the following is true?
How many bijective (one-to-one and onto) functions exist from a set $$A$$ of $$4$$ elements to itself?
